topic_selection_tips: Choose topics that are relevant to B2 students' lives and interests
Ensure topics have enough depth for 400-800 word texts
Select topics that allow for different perspectives and opinions
Consider cultural sensitivity and global relevance
Mix familiar and challenging topics for variety
Ensure topics can generate meaningful comprehension questions
difficulty_considerations: All topics are suitable for B2 level students
Some topics may be more challenging and suitable for upper B2
Consider student background and interests when selecting
Technology and economics topics may require more support
